ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Other zoning bugs
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been quite lucky. I ve never had problems getting GMs to answer my petition/satisfy my problems. Maybe I have an honest face?
ygData.messageBody:
I've been quite lucky. I've never had problems getting GMs to answer
my petition/satisfy my problems.

Maybe I have an honest face?

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
>Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2000 12:59 PM

>That's what I thought too, but apparently the teleport spot for
>Butcherblock
>is at about 10,000 ft. You immediately fall and take 10,000 points anyhow
>which is as you can guess instantly fatal. Not good when you are bound in
>Halas at the time as I was. The GM's never responded to my petition even
>though I was beneath the world and was supposedly teleported to a "safe
>spot"
>
> Kit
